title: The 35 Best Last-Minute Gifts You Can Find on Amazon
description: Nothing says “speedy delivery” quite like Prime shipping.
excerpt: Shop our 35 picks for the best last-minute gifts on Amazon, from bags and jewelry to tech gadgets and foodie finds (all with Prime shipping, of course).

html:
Sleek Gold Hoops

Jenny Bird Mega U-Link Earrings

Made from 14kt gold-dipped brass, Jenny Bird’s hinged U-shaped earrings offer a modern update to the classic oversized hoop. They’re as effortless as they are interesting—and they also come in silver.

Cozy Slippers

Dearfoams Fireside Sydney Shearling Scuff Slipper

Honestly, we wouldn’t judge anyone who wears Dearfoams’ fluffy shearling slippers out of the house. With durable soles, they were practically made for running errands on chilly days.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Kitchen MVP

Our Place Titanium Always Pan Pro

The foodie will appreciate this chrome update to Our Place’s fan-favorite Always Pan. With nonstick technology, the titanium and stainless steel design is as durable as they come.

Classic Candle

NEST New York Scented Candle in Moroccan Amber

You can’t go wrong by gifting a candle, and NEST’s fragrances never miss, and this exotic Moroccan Amber scent is proof.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Silky Pillowcase

Slip Queen Silk Pillow Case

Slip’s silk pillowcase is good for skin and hair. Plus, sleeping on it just feels downright luxe.

Spa-Worthy Shampoo

Goop G.Tox Himalayan Salt Scalp Scrub Shampoo

Himalayan pink salt-infused shampoo that smells like heaven? Yes, please. Goop’s detoxifying whipped scalp scrub is a game changer that leaves hair feeling (and looking) incredibly fresh.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Style Scrapbook

Rizzoli New York Fashion First by Diane Keaton

Diane Keaton’s new book surely deserves a spot on your fashion friend’s coffee table. As she reflects on her style evolution, the acting legend is as charming as ever.

Wet-To-Dry Styler

Dyson Airstrait Straightener

Dyson’s AirStrait is the ultimate time-saver. It dries and straightens hair at the same time, delivering a shiny blowout without the fuss of multiple hot tools.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Crystal-Covered Bag

Coach Tabby Shoulder Bag 20

Few bags have the staying power of Coach’s iconic Tabby design. This black leather version feels particularly special, thanks to its crystal-adorned front pocket.

Skincare Essentials

Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Nourishing Skin Essentials 3 Piece Set

Give the gift of hydration with Elizabeth Arden’s moisturizing skincare set. Their skin, lips, and hands will thank you.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Lounge Socks

UGG Cozy Chenille Socks

Cold feet don’t stand a chance against UGG’s thick chenille socks. They’re perfect for padding around the house—or pairing with UGG boots, for an added layer of warmth.

Minimalist Chain

PAVOI 14kt Gold Plated Paperclip Chain Necklace

A simple gold necklace goes a long way, and Pavoi’s 14kt gold-plated paperclip chain looks nice solo or layered with other pieces.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Cute Kitchen Gadget

OTOTO Mon Cherry Measuring Spoons & Egg Separator

Ototo’s cherry-inspired set of measuring spoons just might be the sweetest addition to any kitchen. The leaf even serves as an egg separator.

Trusty Headphones

Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones

Over-the-ear headphones that are comfortable, noise-canceling, and have up to 24 hours of battery life on just one charge? You might want to grab Bose’s QuietComfort headphones (which are a favorite of senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong) for yourself, too.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Beauty Tool

BeautyBio Quartz Roller Pure

Not only does BeautyBio’s quartz roller help reduce puffiness, promote lymphatic drainage, and improve skin texture, but it also happens to look nice enough to leave out on the nightstand.

Caffeine Fix

Keurig K-Mini Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

Upgrade their old coffee maker with Keurig’s single-serve mini machine. It’s impressively compact at less than five inches wide, but they’ll still be able to brew a cup as large as they want.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zen Treatment

SpaFinder Gift Card

Sure, a gift card may not feel personal. But when they happily realize that you’re treating them to a massage, facial, or another service of their choosing through SpaFinder, it won’t even matter.

Eye Massager

RENPHO Eyeris 3 Eye Massager With Heat and Cooling

With heating and cooling modes, Renpho’s voice-controlled eye massager brings on some serious stress relief.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dainty Huggies

Ana Luisa Toda Double Hoop Earrings

Those with sensitive skin can take (literal) comfort in the fact that Ana Luisa’s 14kt gold-plated sterling silver earrings are hypoallergenic. The double-hoop design is also blissfully water-resistant.

Tech-Friendly Gloves

Isotoner Mya Microsuede Touchscreen-Compatible Gloves

It’s hard to find stylish touchscreen-compatible gloves, but Isotoner’s microsuede pair features a faux fur cuff that certainly adds a bit of glamour.
